page.title: 14KINNEFF WOMEN'S GUILD
page.content: {KINNEFF WOMEN'S GUILD}is held in the Kinneff Church from October until April. It is held every month and is open to ladies of the community .The Guild has a committee and various delegates as well as afficials who are responsible for the organisation of speakers and activities. There are various speakers at the meetings talking on subjects from "travel" to "cruelty to children". There are approximately 27 members mainly middle age women but younger members would be most welcome as there is not a young mothers' group in the area.Any money that is surplus is usually used to purchase an article for use in the church or the ground e.g. this year it was a lawn-mower. The meetings are brought to a close with tea and sandwiches.
